text: læa hnung cak sayyan thanghlay khxng phraxngkh khux thrng srang khukhrxng hı kæ phwk cea cak taw khxng phwk cea xeng pheux phwk cea ca di mi khwam sukh xyu kab nang læa thrng hı mi khwam rak khır læa khwam metta rahwang phwk cea thæcring nı kar ni nænxn yxm pen sayyan kæ hmu chn phu khırkhrwy
